title: Keir Starmer – 2023 Comments on the Death of Betty Boothroyd
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sir Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 27 February 2023.
content:
Betty Boothroyd was a dedicated and devoted public servant who will be dearly missed by all who knew her.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

  *[SEND]: special educational needs and/or disabilities

  *[

 ]: education inspection framework

My thoughts – and the thoughts of the Labour Party – are with her friends and family.
